Enlarged head, lips, cheeks, tongue, and nose Enlarged vocal cords, resulting in a deep voice Frequent upper respiratory infections Sleep apnea Hydrocephalus Hepatosplenomegaly (enlarged liver and spleen) Umbilical hernia Inguinal hernia Hearing loss Recurrent ear infections  Corneal clouding Carpal tunnel syndrome Narrowing of the spinal canal (spinal stenosis) Heart valve abnormalities, which can lead to h
